arStrings.szText: (PH) {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy Poisoned by {c_important}Spore Pod{/c} has up to a {c_number}[{SF_18}|%|]{/c} chance to release a spore in a random direction.
(PH) Casting {c_important}Spore Pod{/c} now instantly creates {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} pods around you instead.
(PH) When {c_important}Spore Pod{/c} bursts on an enemy there is a {c_number}[{SF_15}|%|]{/c} chance to regrow another pod at that location {c_number}[{SF_16}|2|]{/c} seconds later.
